page.title: 15Recreation in Llanhari
page.content: Facilities for recreation in the village include a playing field and childrens play ground,a new community centre (1981) and 3 smaller halls.The main recreational activities for adults are the Working Mens' Club and the two public houses,the'Bear'and the 'Fox and Hounds'.Organisations are mostly based on the'Club' and the Church,and these include Football, Skittles,Horticultural and Pigeon clubs. Childrens organisations are limited to two very successful Jazz Bands (marching) and youth football. There are no guide or scout groups.
